name: Avastars
description:
This ragtag group of outsiders, weirdos, and rejects may not look like much, but what they lack in skills, they make up for with HEART!

Art School didn't have a basketball team. So we made one. A class-wide collaboration created in the Art Games class at The School of The Art Institute of Chicago, Spring 2016.

Created with Unity, Makehuman, and CMU mocap data
